title: Episode 17 - Soviet Atomic Bomb
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we learn about the origins of the Soviet atomic bomb. How much did Soviet espionage help in building the Soviet atomic industry ? Why didn't Germany produce an atomic bomb in world War II ? How did Soviet development of the atomic bomb change the course of the Cold War ? Learn this and more in our latest episode!
